    version: 0.9

    Floating Action Button (FAB)

    A FAB highlights a primary action and floats above the page content.

    The Floating Action Button (FAB) is a circular button that floats above the content to promote a primary action. It can be used to trigger key tasks like adding, creating, or navigating, and is typically positioned in the bottom corner of the screen.

    Usage (Default Icon Only)

    Use a single-icon FAB for quick access to the primary action on a page.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Default
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-small">
											<h5>Default</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper position-bottom-right">
											<a href="#!" class="fab">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
										</div>
									</div>

    Text Only

    Use a text-only FAB when icons aren’t needed, ideal for more descriptive actions.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Text default
    Create 
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-small">
											<h5>Text default</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper position-bottom-right">
											<a href="#!" class="fab fab-text fab-secondary">Create</a>
										</div>
									</div>

    Text and Icon

    Combine text with an icon to make the FAB’s purpose clearer and more intuitive.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Text + icon default
    Create 
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-small">
											<h5>Text + icon default</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper position-bottom-right">
											<a href="#!" class="fab fab-text fab-success">
												<svg></svg>
												Create
											</a>
										</div>
									</div>

    Multiple FABs

    Display a group of floating action buttons for quick access to several related actions.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Multiple
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium">
											<h5>Multiple</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper position-bottom-right">
											<a href="#!" class="fab fab-success fab-dark">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
											<a href="#!" class="fab fab-secondary fab-dark">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
											<a href="#!" class="fab">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
										</div>
									</div>

    Size Modifiers

    Use .fab-small or .fab-large to change the size of the button according to your layout needs.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Mini
    Large
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-small">
											<h5>Mini</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper position-bottom-right">
											<a href="#!" class="fab fab-small fab-danger">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
										</div>
									</div>

									<div class="card round margin-large-top">
										<div class="card-body height-small">
											<h5>Large</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper position-bottom-right">
											<a href="#!" class="fab fab-large fab-primary">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
										</div>
									</div>

    Speed Dial FAB

    A floating action button that expands to reveal multiple related actions on tap or hover.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Speed dial horizontal
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium">
											<h5>Speed dial horizontal</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper fab-speed-dial position-bottom-right" data-fab='{"horizontal": true}'>
											<a href="#!" class="fab">
												<svg></svg>
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
											<div class="fab-wrapper-inner">
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>
    • Preview
    • Markup
    Speed dial horizontal (hover mode)
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium">
											<h5>Speed dial horizontal (hover mode)</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper fab-speed-dial position-bottom-right" data-fab='{"horizontal": true, "hover": true}'>
											<a href="#!" class="fab">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
											<div class="fab-wrapper-inner">
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>
    • Preview
    • Markup
    Speed dial
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium">
											<h5>Speed dial</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper fab-speed-dial position-bottom-right" data-fab>
											<a href="#!" class="fab">
												<svg></svg>
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
											<div class="fab-wrapper-inner">
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>
    • Preview
    • Markup
    Speed dial (hover mode)
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium">
											<h5>Speed dial (hover mode)</h5>
										</div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper fab-speed-dial position-bottom-right" data-fab='{"hover": true}'>
											<a href="#!" class="fab">
												<svg></svg>
											</a>
											<div class="fab-wrapper-inner">
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
												<a href="#!" class="fab">
													<svg></svg>
												</a>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>

    Single Sheet FAB

    Display a list of related actions in a single sheet that appears when the FAB is triggered.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Move to folder Edit Flag Delete 
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium"></div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper fab-sheet position-bottom-right" data-fab>
											<svg class="fab-sheet-trigger" /></svg>

											<div class="fab-sheet-actions">
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Move to folder
												</a>
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Edit
												</a>
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Flag
												</a>
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Delete
												</a>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>
    • Preview
    • Markup
    Move to folder Edit Flag Delete 
    
									<div class="card round">
										<div class="card-body height-medium"></div>
										<div class="fab-card-wrapper fab-sheet  position-bottom-right" data-fab>
											<svg class="fab-sheet-trigger"></svg>
											<div class="fab-sheet-actions">
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Move to folder
												</a>
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Edit
												</a>
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Flag
												</a>
												<a href="#!">
													<svg></svg>
													Delete
												</a>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>
